item.title: Investment firm CEO who wrote down his stake in X to zero says he expects Elon Musk to fail in Washington: ‘The federal government is going to eat him up and spit him out’
item.description: "The idea that you can fire all these people doesn’t work," Ross Gerber said. “We're about to see an epic battle.”

item.title: H-1B visa debates roil U.S.-India relations ahead of Trump-Modi meeting. Here’s what needs to change—on both sides
item.description: Can "Made in the USA" and "Make in India" coexist? Protectionist policies from each side are hindering progress.

item.title: Tesla demand is nosediving in EV-friendly Europe amid Elon Musk’s endorsement of the far right
item.description: Popularity has plummeted in markets like Germany, a country still haunted by its fascist past, where Tesla's share of EV sales plummeted to just 3.7% ...

item.title: So long, Billabong. Virtually all Quiksilver, Billabong, and Volcom stores are shutting down in the U.S., and roughly 1,400 employees will be laid off
I’m a refugee-turned-entrepreneur and Oxford professor. Here’s what we can all learn from the immigrant entrepreneurs who make America great
item.description: Certain principles commonly applied by immigrant entrepreneurs help explain their success—and can be borrowed.
